price: Rabbinin ismini zikret ve her şeyden kendini çekerek yalnızca O'na yönel.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلۡ إِلَيۡهِ تَبۡتِيلٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kuri is'ma rabbika watabattal ilayhi tabtīlan
